sourcesContent:
export const EventsData = [
    {
        "EventName": "Resume Building Workshop",
        "date": "2023-05-10",
        "location": "Auditorium A101",
        "description": "Join us for a hands-on workshop on building effective resumes. Learn the best practices for crafting a compelling resume that showcases your skills and experiences to potential employers.",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580894732444-8ecded7900cd?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1770&q=80"
    },
    {
        "EventName": "Mock Interview Sessions",
        "date": "2023-05-15",
        "location": "Conference Room B202",
        "description": "Prepare for your upcoming interviews with our mock interview sessions. Gain valuable feedback and insights from industry professionals to help you improve your interview skills and increase your chances of success.",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1622675103136-e4b90c9a33d6?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8NHx8UHJvZmVzc2lvbmFsJTIwRGV2ZWxvcG1lbnR8ZW58MHx8MHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=60"
    },
    {
        "EventName": "Guest Lecture on Career Planning",
        "date": "2023-05-20",
        "location": "Lecture Hall C301",
        "description": "Join us for an informative guest lecture on career planning by renowned industry expert, Mr. John Smith. Learn about the latest trends in the job market, strategies for career growth, and valuable insights on building a successful career.",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552581234-26160f608093?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8OXx8UHJvZmVzc2lvbmFsJTIwRGV2ZWxvcG1lbnR8ZW58MHx8MHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=60"
    },
    {
        "EventName": "Networking Mixer",
        "date": "2023-05-25",
        "location": "Student Commons",
        "description": "Expand your professional network at our networking mixer event. Connect with alumni, industry professionals, and fellow students in a relaxed and informal setting. Build meaningful connections that can open doors to new opportunities.",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517048676732-d65bc937f952?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTJ8fFByb2Zlc3Npb25hbCUyMERldmVsb3BtZW50fGVufDB8fDB8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=60"
    },
    {
        "EventName": "Career Fair 2023",
        "date": "2023-06-01",
        "location": "Gymnasium",
        "description": "Don't miss our annual Career Fair, featuring top companies from various industries. Network with recruiters, explore internship and job opportunities, and learn about the hiring process. Bring your resume and dress professionally for this exciting event!",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1554774853-aae0a22c8aa4?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTd8fFByb2Zlc3Npb25hbCUyMERldmVsb3BtZW50fGVufDB8fDB8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=60"
    },
    {
        "EventName": "LinkedIn Workshop",
        "date": "2023-06-08",
        "location": "Computer Lab D401",
        "description": "Learn how to optimize your LinkedIn profile and leverage this powerful professional networking platform to build your online presence, connect with industry professionals, and enhance your job search efforts. Don't miss this valuable workshop!",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517245386807-bb43f82c33c4?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTB8fFByb2Zlc3Npb25hbCUyMERldmVsb3BtZW50fGVufDB8fDB8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=60"

    },
    {
        "EventName": "Industry Panel Discussion",
        "date": "2023-06-15",
        "location": "Lecture Hall B201",
        "description": "Get insights from industry experts in a panel discussion on the latest trends, challenges, and opportunities in your field of interest. Hear from professionals who have excelled in their careers and gain valuable knowledge to shape your own career path.",
        "image": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1488998527040-85054a85150e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MjB8fFByb2Zlc3Npb25hbCUyMERldmVsb3BtZW50fGVufDB8fDB8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=60"

    }
]
